A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: many plot holes\, there is no reasonable explanation why luke acted the way he did. It seemed completly out of character if you remember him from Episode VI. \nIt fell like the film tries too hard to transport political messages\, for example that women are badass patient warriors\, eating meat is wrong\, capitalism is bad\, men are machos (which is bad of course) and inferior to women and so on.
